title: Decommissioning Fukushima The Battle to Contain Radioactivity 72
description: Decommissioning Fukushima: The Battle to Contain Radioactivity History Documentary hosted by Steven Kearney, published by NHK in 2016 - English narration http://docuwiki.net/images/c/c3/Decommissioning-Fukushima-The-Battle-to-Contain-Radioactivity-Cover.jpg Information ------------------------------ Decommissioning Fukushima: The Battle to Contain Radioactivity TEPCO's Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Power Plant is the site of one of history's worst nuclear disasters: the meltdown of three nuclear reactors. The decommissioning program in Japan learns from the Three Mile Island decommissioning in the US after the nuclear plant accident in 1976 in Pennsylvania. We look at recovery efforts and challenges to cleaning up Fukushima after the tsunami affected the nuclear plant. Decommissioning Fukushima, "Some estimates say it will take over 40 years until all the work is complete. This could be the longest running documentary of all time Harry65."
